original_text:
For you shall be in league with the stones of the field,
    and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with you.
korean_text: 들에 있는 돌이 너와 언약을 맺겠고 들짐승이 너와 화목하게 살 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For you shall be in league with the stones of the field,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 밭의 돌들과 친하게 될 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with you.
